name: Krespuckle the Ever-Hungry
content:
Krespuckle the Ever-Hungry was a Leviathan—a type of gigantic Sithspawn monster—which was created by the Dark Jedi exile Sorzus Syn. Syn considered Krespuckle to be her favorite Leviathan and wrote about it in Book of Sith, a collection of historical writings.
Krespuckle the Ever-Hungry was introduced by Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side, a 2012 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace.
